results.content:
This course is divided into following levels.
Beginner - clear understanding of all the basic concepts of JMS
Intermediate - A Brief introduction of the execution flow
Expert - Assignments, Quiz and live practical demos.

This course is divided into following levels.
Beginner - clear understanding of all the basic concepts of JMS
Intermediate - A Brief introduction of the execution flow
Expert - Assignments, Quiz and live practical demos.

results.content: It's a pretty thorough treatment of JMS. I learned a lot from it, and the exercises were good and helped clarify the concepts. The only suggestion I would have is maybe include a short video comparing ActiveMQ with other providers like RabbitMQ.

results.content:
It is a really good course, it explains the very basics to understand the technology and increases the complexity very smoothly.
What I would also suggest is to also include new/modern implementations with Spring JMS and Spring Boot Starter Artemis (both, not just one of them) after the basics have been explained from scratch, there is a bridge in most of courses where things are explained using modern stuff but lacks of the reason of using them and comprehend the background of it.
results.content_html:

What I would also suggest is to also include new/modern implementations with Spring JMS and Spring Boot Starter Artemis (both, not just one of them) after the basics have been explained from scratch, there is a bridge in most of courses where things are explained using modern stuff but lacks of the reason of using them and comprehend the background of it.

results.content: Could have covered more concepts like showing activemq gui and more examples on springboot with jms
results.content_html: Could have covered more concepts like showing activemq gui and more examples on springboot with jms

results.content:
The structure of this course is logically constructed. Each component flows into the other. The instructor makes (sometimes hard to understand) concepts easy to follow by giving a short overview of the core concepts and then putting them in action. Every step that is necessary to create the examples alongside the instructor is explained and no steps are skipped.
In summary, I have the feeling that I now understand the core concepts and practices of JMS. I feel confident to put them into action in my job and broaden my knowledge in the field.
results.content_html:
The structure of this course is logically constructed. Each component flows into the other. The instructor makes (sometimes hard to understand) concepts easy to follow by giving a short overview of the core concepts and then putting them in action. Every step that is necessary to create the examples alongside the instructor is explained and no steps are skipped.
In summary, I have the feeling that I now understand the core concepts and practices of JMS. I feel confident to put them into action in my job and broaden my knowledge in the field.

results.content: Examples are hard to track and trace. Thread.sleep makes things (at least for me) confusing. Instead of this way they could be microservices or at least basic server apps running on tomcat etc.

response.content:
Safak,

All the hands on examples are simple standalone java program allowing you to master the various concepts of JMS.And  you will also learn how to work with Application Servers like Jboss and even Spring JMS at the end.Let me know where you could not trace and track and i can help.
response.content_html:
Safak,

All the hands on examples are simple standalone java program allowing you to master the various concepts of JMS.And you will also learn how to work with Application Servers like Jboss and even Spring JMS at the end.Let me know where you could not trace and track and i can help.

results.content_html: Examples are hard to track and trace. Thread.sleep makes things (at least for me) confusing. Instead of this way they could be microservices or at least basic server apps running on tomcat etc.

results.content: The code examples are so simple. Programs run and exit immediately, no continuing. You cannot design a real application by using these code templates. Explanation of concepts are usually good but in some parts more explanations needed. I expected more features like concurrency in examples, which is a must for many jms applications.
results.content_html: The code examples are so simple. Programs run and exit immediately, no continuing. You cannot design a real application by using these code templates. Explanation of concepts are usually good but in some parts more explanations needed. I expected more features like concurrency in examples, which is a must for many jms applications.
